I am alone and afraid, hoping that the City I love won’t be abandoned to the ravages of corona virus or burned to the ground by those exploiting a horrific act of racial violence. Praying that those who have taken to the streets won’t spread the deadly disease and kill us all.

This is so scary. My sister lives in an assisted living facility across the street from @H_SeniorLife. May the residents rest in peace.
